729137f-a.title: Richmond: McClean Avenue - Sand Lane
729137f-a.text:
281 McClean Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Sand Lane. Beers's
map of 1874 indicates it to have been on the W.W. McFarland estate.
The house is 25 yards back of the avenue.
August 25, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729137f-a.folder: McClean Avenue & Sand Lane, Staten Island, NY
